Authors:
Kunthida Phutthacharoen, Thilini Chethana, Marc Stadler,
Kevin D. Hyde
Title:
Dicephalospora chiangraiensis sp. nov. (Helotiaceae,
Helotiales) from Thailand
Keywords: 1 new species, Helotiales, taxonomy, Thai microfungi.
Abstract:
Dicephalospora is a genus of Helotiaceae (Helotiales) that
presently comprises 14 species, all of which were collected from Asia.
The current study describes an additional new species and a collection
from Chiang Rai Province, Thailand, for which we propose the name
Dicephalospora chiangraiensis sp. nov. The new fungus was recognized
based on morphological characters coupled with phylogenetic analyses of
combined LSU and ITS loci.
